===========================
Long Term Packing Checklist
===========================

Kitchen
-------
#. Coffee
    #. Aeropress
    #. Coffee Filters
    #. Coffee grinder

#. Appliances

    #. Air Fryer
    #. Pressure cooker
    #. Blender
    #. Dehydrator
    #. Electric Water Kettle

#. Stovetop

   #. 9 inch saut√© pan
   #. Dutch Oven
   #. Serving Spoon
   #. Slotted Serving Spoon
   #. Silcon Spatula

#. Utensils

   #. 2 spoons
   #. 2 forks
   #. 2 knives

#. Feeding Dishes

   #. Large Salad bowl
   #. Mixing bowl
   #. 2 plates
   #. 2 mason jars

#. Tupperware

   #. Large Tupperware
   #. 2-3 medium sized tupperware

#. Mis-en-Place

   #. Cutting Board
   #. Chefs knife
   #. Mandolin
   #. Sponge/dish soap
   #. Strainer

#. Pantry

   #. Salt
   #. Pepper
   #. Beans
   #. Rice
   #. Dried chiles
   #. Quinoa


Bathroom
--------
#. Medicine

   #. First Aid kit
   #. Orally Injected Exogenous Compounds

       #. Rx
       #. NSAID
       #. Acetaminophen
       #. Omega 3
       #. Magnesium
       #. B-vitamins

#. Teeth

   #. Toothbrush
   #. Toothpaste
   #. Floss

#. Beauty

   #. Sunscreen
   #. Topical vitamin C
   #. Deodorant

#. Shower
   #. Soap
   #. Shampoo
   #. Conditioner
   #. Shaving cream
   #. Razors

Office
1. 2 Wrist braces
2. Desk
3. Laptop stand
4. Chair
5. Electronics
    1. Keyboard
    2. Mouse/Mousepad
    3. Wireless Headphones
    4. Tablet
    5. Phone
    6. Computer
    7. External monitor
6. Chargers
    1. 2 Apple chargers
    2. Computer charger
    3. USBC charger
    4. Portable battery
    5. Charging hub
7. Dry erase markers
8. 1- 3 Books
9. Hand drawn
    1. Desk notebook
    2. 2 pens
    3. 3 Pencils
    4. Sharpener
    5. Easel
    6. Drawing Pad

Closet
1. Cloth
    1. 5-7 workout shorts
    2. 10-14 T-shirts
    3. 3 shorts
    4. 3 pants
    5. 8-10 collared shirts
    6. 14 socks
    7. 15 boxers
    8. No tie
2. Jackets
    1.  light jacket
    2.  medium jacket
    3.  winter jacket
    4. 1 waterproof shell jacket
3. Shoes
    1. Exercise
    2. Standard
    3. Sandals

Bedroom
1. Pillow
2. 2 pillow cases
3. 2 Bed sheets
4. Comforter
5. Eye mask

Living Room
1. 1-3 candles
2. Lighter
3. Vice
    1. Vaporizer
    2. Grinder
    3. Marijuana
    4. Kava
4. Workout
    1. Med ball
    2. Mace bell
    3. 1 Dumbbell
    4. 2 clubs
    5. MFR
        1. Small/medium/large ball
        2. Rolling pin
    6. Kettlebell
    7. 2 Elastic bands
    8. Winch strap
    9. Handle/ankle strap
